import React from "react"; import photo from "./stm8blue-pinout.png"; import "./ControlPins.css"; class ControlPins extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { optionValue: "", }; this.handleOptionChange = this.handleOptionChange.bind(this); this.selectValues = ''; } handleOptionChange(event) { // this.setState({ optionValue: event.target.value }); this.selectValues = event.target.value; console.log(event.target.value); } render() { var message = "You selected " + this.state.optionValue; return (

Visual output



{message}

); } } export default ControlPins;
